pages.text: $(li)Hammerhead Sharks are neutral fish that like to live in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/warm_ocean)Warm Oceans$(/l).$(br)$(li)They will only attack any creature that is beneath half health and their special preys: $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/tropical_fish)Tropical Fish$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l).$(br)$(li)Occasionally, when attacking prey, the Hammerhead may drops one of its $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/shark_tooth)Shark Tooth$(/l).
Those can travel better underwater and deal extra damage to aquatic creatures.
